title: The Owner
description: What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas...That's true unless your new husband - who is much younger than you by the way - doesn't actually want a divorce when you both sober up.Or, of course, if you get pregnant - the last thing you need right after becoming the new GM to a failing pro hockey team.I guess you could say this year won't be easy.Especially for me, the owner.
author: Xavier Neal
